full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Title (English) / Titre (French)**: Parts and Services Northern Light / Pièces et Services Northern Light
* **Reference Number**: WS3897318441-Doc3897617831
* ** Solicitation Number**: WS3897318441
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-14
* **Bid Closing Date and Time**: 2023-08-02T14:00:00 ( expired )
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-16
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

## Procurement Details

* ** Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

## Contracting Entity and End User Entities

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Melanie Parent (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16878126?extsite=MTY4NzgxMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Scope of Work

A Request for Standing Offer (RSO) is being issued for the acquisition of repair services and supply of original equipment manufacturers (OEM) spare parts and a certified and trained technician (OEM) for the Northern Light generators of MSPV vessels of the Canadian Coast Guard, as detailed in Annex A. Annex A is attached and available for download.175 

Do you have any questions or is there anything else I can do for you?  Let me know! 
P.S. Let me know if  you want me to review the Annex too. I'm here
